name: CVXcombine
short_description:
A csv/CVX file is a Calibration Values Exchange Format file used by INCA CDM software produced by ETAS GmbH.
This CVXcombine application is develop under ANSI C, useing for combine several csv/CVX files to only one csv/CVX, the concept is to comment the first line of each csv/CVX file by [* **cvx_combine comment this line **] words and paste them in one file, so it can be recognized by INCA CDM as a totally one calibration file. This is always used when make a calibration update after collecting csv/CVX files from different calibration engineers of the workgroup.
summary: A command line program combines several csv/CVX files to one
